description_txt: stated on April 15, 2015 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says Gov. Scott Walker’s proposed state budget contained 110 pages of errors -- an unusually high number -- "and millions of dollars’ worth of mistakes" that were corrected with a follow-up document.

description_txt: stated on May 14, 2015 in a comment on a "State of the State" TV program.:
quote_txt: "Once a woman enters into the sex trade, her average life expectancy is seven years."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • May 31, 2015

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: A 50-50 public-private split for paying for a new Milwaukee Bucks arena would "be much better -- in terms of the portion of the public financing -- than most of the other arena projects done around the country."

description_txt: stated on May 24, 2015 in an interview on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: The Supreme Court "can’t overrule the other two" branches of government.

description_txt: stated on May 20, 2015 in a roundtable in New Hampshire:
quote_txt: "ISIS didn't exist when my brother was president. Al-Qaida in Iraq was wiped out when my brother was president."

description_txt: stated on May 24, 2015 in an interview on CBS' "Face the Nation":
quote_txt: If you count United States airstrikes against ISIS, "75 percent of those combat missions return to base without having fired a weapon."

description_txt: stated on May 22, 2015 in a meme on a Facebook page:
quote_txt: Says Ted Cruz said: "While there may have been an age difference, Josh Duggar’s transgressions are far less an affront to God than what gays do to each other."

description_txt: stated on May 13, 2015 in a segment on his radio show:
quote_txt: Says Hillary Clinton "makes more per hour at a speaking gig than the average CEO does in a year."

description_txt: stated on May 20, 2015 in a meeting with business leaders in Portsmouth, N.H.:
quote_txt: "Florida was the only state during my eight years to go from AA to AAA" in its bond rating.

description_txt: stated on May 22, 2015 in a social media post:
quote_txt: Says Sen. Rand Paul, R-Ky., has stated that supporting the "right to health care ... means you believe in slavery."

description_txt: stated on May 6, 2015 in an interview with Kiah Collier, Austin American-Statesman reporter:
quote_txt: Austin school district "teachers are the lowest paid of any urban" Texas district and the "lowest paid of any surrounding school district."

description_txt: stated on May 13, 2015 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Marco Rubio said that "felons should not have their voting rights restored" but that "convicted felons should be allowed to own guns after they have done their time."

description_txt: stated on May 19, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says Democratic challenger Russ Feingold "was the deciding vote on Obamacare."

description_txt: stated on May 20, 2015 in a new report:
quote_txt: Georgia ranks 49th for women serving in elected state and federal offices.

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2015 in a blog post.:
quote_txt: Says "roughly two-thirds of (state) corporations didn’t pay any income tax in Virginia."

description_txt: stated on May 20, 2015 in a meeting with business leaders in Portsmouth, N.H.:
quote_txt: Says he was known as "Veto Corleone" for cutting spending as Florida governor.

description_txt: stated on May 9, 2015 in a speech:
quote_txt: "For our next two years in my state, we will end with a structural surplus of $499 million."

description_txt: stated on May 14, 2015 in a Facebook post.:
quote_txt: "The United States is one of only seven nations that allows elective abortions after 20 weeks post-fertilization."

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2015 in a House floor debate:
quote_txt: About 85 percent of hotel guests who will pay the new $5 hotel/motel fee will be from outside Georgia.

description_txt: stated on May 13, 2015 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: "Accidents are down 50 percent and injury accidents are down 60 percent" in the rebuilt Marquette Interchange in Milwaukee.

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2015 in testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee.:
quote_txt: There was "a 57-percent decrease in fireworks-related injuries in 2000 [after Connecticut legalized sparklers] compared to the 14 years prior."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • May 24, 2015

description_txt: stated on May 14, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Democrat "Russ Feingold announced his Wisconsin Senate run today from…California."

description_txt: stated on May 17, 2015 in a meme on social media:
quote_txt: "During Obama's first five years as president, black unemployment increased 42 percent. During Reagan's presidency, black unemployment dropped 20 percent."

description_txt: stated on May 16, 2015 in a speech at the Iowa GOP Lincoln Day dinner:
quote_txt: "One person has been fired" at the Veterans Administration for withholding services.

description_txt: stated on May 14, 2015 in a panel discussion :
quote_txt: As a senator, Hillary Clinton "actually paid female staffers a lot less than men."

description_txt: stated on May 15, 2015 in an interview on Fox News:
quote_txt: Says the State Department has "had half a year" to respond to a Benghazi document request, yet "I have not gotten a single, solitary scrap of paper."

description_txt: stated on July 12, 2014 in a roundtable with Texas businesses:
quote_txt: "Every year we spend roughly $500 billion on tax compliance. That is roughly the budget of our entire military, entirely wasted on tax compliance."

description_txt: stated on May 14, 2015 in a column on Medium:
quote_txt: Says Jeb Bush "once held $1 million in family planning grants hostage until the programs receiving the money agreed not to discuss birth control at all."

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "There are more members of the U.S. Senate than the number of WI families who would benefit from GOP estate tax break."

description_txt: stated on May 18, 2015 in an appearance in Mason City, Iowa:
quote_txt: Hedge fund managers "pay less in taxes than nurses and truck drivers."
